docs.lead_paragraph: When the Liberal Democrats were kingmakers in elections last year, agreement with the party's leader, Nick Clegg, was the passport to power -- but few support him now.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a speech in Michigan on Thursday, Mitt Romney, the former governor of Massachusetts, sought to explain the past and, at the same time, shift attention to the future.

headline.main: Romney's Rhetoric on Health Care Echoes Obama

docs.abstract: In wonky language that echoed President Obama in 2009, Mitt Romney laid out the reasoning behind the universal health care plan he championed as governor of Massachusetts.
